titleInfo.title: ‘Trigonometrical Plan of the Backwater at Ul Umrah on the Arabian side of the Persian Gulf by Lieut. R. Cogan under the direction of Lt. J.M. Guy, H.C. Marine, 1822’

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink on paperDimensions:637 x 454 mm, on sheet 732 x 535 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Depths shown by soundings.Hand drawn nautical chart of the shores of the Persian Gulf compiled from the survey carried out by the Bombay Marine’s officers in 1822 showing Ul Umrah [Al Jazīrah al Ḩamrā’, United Arab Emirates].Includes notes on detailed water levels and soundings with latitude and longitude of the town reported.Oriented with south to the top.
